TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReadWriteControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is ContainerControlDesigner because it uses an EditableDesignerRegion for editing the content. Designer regions allow for better control of the content being edited. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: Extiende el comportamiento en tiempo de diseño para los controles del servidor de lectura o escritura.

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for read/write server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > La clase está obsoleta.The class is obsolete. Use la clase para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.Use the class for equivalent control designer functionality. Este diseñador de controles permite colocar controles en el control para este diseñador.This control designer provides the ability to drop controls onto the control for this designer.

para.span: Los implementadores de diseñadores que quiere que su control para admitir la adición de controles secundarios deben utilizar .

span.span: Implementers of designers who would like their control to support the addition of child controls should use .

para.span: Si no desea que el control para admitir controles secundarios, utilice un diseñador derivado de .

span.span: If you do not want your control to support child controls, use a designer derived from .
